text: Nzira yavo yokukumbira imomo, ichava Sub-haanaka Allaahumma (Kurumbidzwa kwamuri, Imi Allah!) uye Salaam (Runyararo, chengetedzo kubva kune zvakaipa) kuchava kumhorosana kwavo imomo (muParadhiso)! Uye mhedzisiro yekukumbira kwavo kuchava Al-hamdu lillaahi Rabbil- Aalameen (Rumbidzo nekutendwa ngazvive kuna Allah, Tenzi weAl-Aalameen (vanhu, maJinn nezvose zviripo)
